Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • SLController
      • Controller

  • public class Controller
extends SLController
    The controller class now has 3 main classes. The first, is the start button The second, is the set action. The third, is the mentionWaiting action.
    Author:
    Derek Halden

      • inputTextAction

        public void inputTextAction(java.lang.String input)
        Description copied from class: SLController
        The following abstract methods are called by the View object when the user has performed an action. The other methods in the View object can be called by this controller to manipulate the view or display text in the text area and/or test fields. Note that view and model objects must be registered using registerView() and registerModel().
        Specified by:
        inputTextAction in class SLController
